law.catch_line: Recognition of "Family Support Act of 1988" mandate.
law.text: The General Assembly recognizes that under the federal "Family Support Act of 1988," P.L. 100-485, the Commonwealth of Kentucky is required to implement child support guidelines.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 418, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 258, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 11.
